name: route_information
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bart.
Tool description: The BART API gives you access to pretty much all of the BART service and station data available on the BART website.
API description: Fetch route information from the BART API using the given command.

cmd.description: The command to send to the BART API. Possible commands can be found at http://api.bart.gov/docs/overview/examples.aspx.
